articles.title: Galaxy Tab S7 series gets Android 11 w/ better phone integration, ‘Second Screen’ on Windows [U] - 9to5Google
articles.description: Samsung has started rolling out Android 11 to its Galaxy Tab S7 series tablets, making them some of the first tablets to get the update.
articles.content:
Samsung’s One UI 3.0 rollout has expanded to quite a few different smartphones at this point, and now it’s heading to tablets. The Galaxy Tab S7 and S7+ are now getting Android 11.
